mapper.select: SELECT bt.id, b.isbn, b.name, b.author, b.category_id, b.detail, b.status, bc.name as type, b.url, b.count, bt.plan_return_date, bt.rent_date, bt.return_date, bt.is_continue, bt.user_id, bt.todo_status, bt.approver_id, bt.create_time, bt.user_name FROM sys_borrowing_ticket AS bt INNER JOIN sys_book AS b ON bt.book_id = b.id INNER JOIN sys_book_category AS bc ON b.type = bc.id WHERE bt.user_id = #{userid}
